item.description:
Have you ever wondered if Vitamins really work? What to buy, Organic or What to skip? 
Come hear about what ages us, what to eat, and what to avoid for the Best Health Advantage.

Four years ago, Susan Wilson was laid off, feeling tired and getting chronic sinus infections. She was now uncertain of employment and ill, yet one thing was clear, she needed to change. So she opened her mind to something, something that she was passionate about, and that's when The Universe, Spirirt, God, etc. guided her. Research led her to how important 9+ servings of raw fruits and veggies, every day, are to our diet. It affects our energy, illness, mood, etc.  She, now educates people about what is needed on a daily basis and how to get what we need every day, through local Farm Stands, gardens, perhaps your own garden, the right kind of supplements called Juice Plus.

Susan will speak about:

Why some societies have active older adults into their 90's, while others need several medications to survive.

What can we do NOW to slow down and/or avoid the onset of disease (like cancer, arthritis, diabetes...) and feel our best.

Provide more info on how "Juice Plus"changed her life .

Better health is within our reach and it doesn't have to be expensive. Come listen and learn!

Susan Wilson ~  978-922-5427
www.susanwilsonjuiceplus.com to see the research
www.childrenshealthstudy.com to receive free Juice Plus for children

 

Ellen Sklaver

Motivational Facilitator

617-750-4830
item.how_to_find_us: We will be meeting in the closed off back room
